overview_of_class: The objective of this course is to familiarize students with everything they need to know about covering the music industry. Students will study how to develop and maintain a productive music beat. The class will take advantage of Chicago's rich music culture and require coverage of summer music festivals, including the Taste of Chicago concerts, Lollapalooza and other popular events. Students will learn to write critical reviews of CDs and concerts and will learn how artists use social media to build community.
name: Covering Popular Music
title: JOUR JOUR 478-0-20 Covering Popular Music
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
